```{r setup, error=FALSE, include=FALSE, results= FALSE }
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

```

```{r}
DF <- read_csv("WebScience_Ref.csv")
colnames(DF) <- make.names(colnames(DF))
```

```{r}
DF1 <- DF %>% 
  mutate(`General object` = case_when(
    Study.object %in% c("Household combution","People",  "Urban areas")~"Humans",  
    
    Study.object %in% c("Aegorhinus",  "Bird species", "Craspedacusta", "Crustacean", "Dromiciops","Fishes","Herpetofauna", "Salmonids", "Liolaemus", "Wild boar", "Woodwasp")~"Animals",
    
    Study.object %in% c("Cyanobacteria","Didymosphenia",  "Lichen", "Protozoa")~"Other organims",
    
    Study.object %in% c("Aquatic plants", "Chusquea","Embothrium","Ferns" ,"Lichen", "Native vegetation", "Pollen", "Proteaceae", "Sarmienta" )~"Plants",
    
    Study.object %in% c("Austrocedrus","Coihue-Rauli-Tepa forest" ,"F. cupressoides", "Forest","Native forest", "Evergreen trees", "Nothofagus", "Coihue-Rauli-Tepa")~"Forest communities",
    
    Study.object %in% c("Basins", "Groundwater Storage", "Lakes", "runoff", "Soil","Streams", "watershed", "Regional subdivision")~"Geographic elements", 
    
    Study.object %in% c("Fires","Particulate matter","Precipitation", "Rock art")~"Physical conditions",
    Study.object %in% c("Database records", "Spatial proyection", "Temperature records", "Fire database")~"Data bases"
    ))
  
 DF_objectTable <- DF1 %>%  
  group_by(`General object`, Study.object) %>% summarise(n = n()) %>% ungroup() %>% dplyr::filter(!is.na(Study.object)) %>%
  rename(`Study object`=Study.object, `No of articles`=n) %>% 
  select(`General object`, `Study object`, `No of articles`)


kable(DF_objectTable, booktabs = T, caption = "Study objects in detail", align = "l") %>% 
  collapse_rows(columns = 1, latex_hline = "major", valign = "middle")
  

```
